activities: Applango receives names, email addresses and other personal identification data about users of Software applications it monitors. Such identifiers are used to correlate usage information and provide statistics about software application usage for the company's customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Applango will cooperate with JAMS under the JAMS international mediation rules
